model

Class Pokemon

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • model.Pokemon
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Blastoise, Charizard, Dragonite, Gengar, Gyarados, Mewtwo, Pidgeotto, Pikachu, Scyther, Venusaur

    public abstract class Pokemon
extends java.util.Observable
    abstract class used to design the pokemon. It sets everything about the piokemon like, rarity, HP, namerunChance, catchRate etc
    Author:
    Aakash

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Pokemon(java.lang.String pkmnName, int pkmnDexNum, java.lang.String pkmnType, int pkmnRarity, int pkmnHP)
      constructor to set the runchance maxTurns and catchRate according to the pokemon's rarity
